questions.question_text_1: THIS IS QUESTION PAPER FOR THE SUBJECT "DEGREE LEVEL : SOFTWARE TESTING (COMPUTER BASED EXAM)" ARE YOU SURE YOU HAVE TO WRITE EXAM FOR THIS SUBJECT? CROSS CHECK YOUR HALL TICKET TO CONFIRM THE SUBJECTS TO BE WRITTEN. (IF IT IS NOT THE CORRECT SUBJECT, PLS CHECK THE SECTION AT THE TOP FOR THE SUBJECTS REGISTERED BY YOU)
question_texts: THIS IS QUESTION PAPER FOR THE SUBJECT "DEGREE LEVEL : SOFTWARE TESTING (COMPUTER BASED EXAM)" ARE YOU SURE YOU HAVE TO WRITE EXAM FOR THIS SUBJECT? questions.question_text_1:
Consider the following statements and select the correct option. 
i) The interior vertices in a chain can have in-degree and/or out-degree greater than 1. ii) A maximal chain is a chain that is not a part of any other chain.
question_texts:
Consider the following statements and select the correct option. 
i) The interior vertices in a chain can have in-degree and/or out-degree greater than 1. ii) A maximal chain is a chain that is not a part of any other chain.

options.option_text: Statement (i) is true but statement (ii) is false
Statement (i) is false but statement (ii) is true

questions.question_text_1: Edge coverage on graphs is equivalent to which of the following coverage criteria on finite state machines (FSM)?
question_texts: Edge coverage on graphs is equivalent to which of the following coverage criteria on finite state machines (FSM)?

questions.question_text_1: Suppose an organization that is developing an automated hydroponic system. The main objective of testing in the organization is to show the presence of failures. Testers and developers cooperate to reduce the risks associated with using the system, which can have different levels of consequences. Choose the minimum process maturity level of the organization, considering its testing goals.
question_texts: Suppose an organization that is developing an automated hydroponic system. The main objective of testing in the organization is to show the presence of failures. Testers and developers cooperate to reduce the risks associated with using the system, which can have different levels of consequences. Choose the minimum process maturity level of the organization, considering its testing goals.

questions.question_text_1: Identify the minimum number of test paths required to satisfy node coverage and edge coverage.
question_texts: Identify the minimum number of test paths required to satisfy node coverage and edge coverage.

options.option_text: 1 for node coverage and 2 for edge coverage.
2 for both node coverage and edge coverage.
2 for node coverage and 3 for edge coverage.
3 for both node coverage and edge coverage.

questions.question_text_1:
Consider the following set of test paths. 
{[1, 2, 4, 6], [1, 3, 5, 3, 4, 6]}. 
Identify the correct statement from the following options.
question_texts:
Consider the following set of test paths. 
{[1, 2, 4, 6], [1, 3, 5, 3, 4, 6]}. 
Identify the correct statement from the following options.

options.option_text: It satisfies node coverage, but not edge coverage.
It satisfies node coverage and edge coverage, but not edge-pair coverage.
It satisfies node edge-pair coverage, but not prime path coverage.
